name: Nevidljivi solo
text1: The Invisible Solo is a body writing project where I explore my complicated relationship with dance and somatic practices in the context of personal history and the stories I tell myself.
text2: Proin imperdiet sed purus sed pharetra. Donec elementum eget ex eu tristique. Nulla venenatis massa non odio convallis lobortis. Pellentesque nec porttitor lectus. Sed libero nulla, eleifend non maximus ut, eleifend vel neque.

name: Imprint
text1: A web app for writing. It’s main purpose is to enable the writer to focus with embedded useful side tools.

name: Bookie
text1: A web app for tracking your personal library. You can track your books, it’s status, and their circulation among your friends.

name: Sobbing
text1: A personal blog for my eclectic content I consider worth sharing. When I think about this page I think a lot about zines.

name: Playground
text1: Pure chaos. Space for experimentation. Here I invite myself to practice, break the rules, dismantle concepts, abandon ideas, and let the breakthrough be born through coincidence. If you’re looking for sense and structure this is probably not a link to visit

name: Bookstore website
text1: A mock website for an imagined future space.
